job_details.Vacaturetitel: Graduate Software Engineer .NET and Frontend JavaScript
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server, on platforms like Azure and AWS. We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits., At Exact, we believe in balancing work with personal well-being. With on-site gyms and coffee bars, we are committed to supporting your work-life balance. As a Software Engineer, enjoy additional benefits including:
     * A flexible work contract (32-40 hours/week), with a mix of office and home-based work.
     * A 13th-month salary and compensation for commuting or remote work.
     * Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
     * Home office setup allowance.
     * 27 holidays, 3 volunteer days, and up to 5 loyalty days off.

   Ready to Join Us?

   We'd love to have you on our team! Apply via the link below. Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors. If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues. The selection process concludes within two weeks and, if successful, you'll receive an offer to join us at Exact.

   Contact our Talent Acquisition Specialist with any questions. At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.

   About Exact

   Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction. This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing. More than 675,000 companies primarily in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany already rely on Exact's software.
job_details.full_text:
Graduate Software Engineer .NET and Frontend JavaScript

Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server, on platforms like Azure and AWS. We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits., At Exact, we believe in balancing work with personal well-being. With on-site gyms and coffee bars, we are committed to supporting your work-life balance. As a Software Engineer, enjoy additional benefits including:
     * A flexible work contract (32-40 hours/week), with a mix of office and home-based work.
     * A 13th-month salary and compensation for commuting or remote work.
     * Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
     * Home office setup allowance.
     * 27 holidays, 3 volunteer days, and up to 5 loyalty days off.

   Ready to Join Us?

   We'd love to have you on our team! Apply via the link below. Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors. If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues. The selection process concludes within two weeks and, if successful, you'll receive an offer to join us at Exact.

   Contact our Talent Acquisition Specialist with any questions. At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.

   About Exact

   Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction. This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing. More than 675,000 companies primarily in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany already rely on Exact's software.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional software engineering within a Microsoft tech stack and cloud platforms. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related concepts, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: Graduate Software Engineer .NET and Frontend JavaScript
Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server
build, integrate, and deploy AI features into user-facing applications
job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is developing software using .NET and JavaScript, which falls under traditional software development. While the description mentions 'AI features', it's in the context of integrating them, not developing them from scratch or working with generative models.

phrases: Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants.
The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction.
This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing.
job_tasks.justification: The description details the company's products, target market (SMBs, accountants), and the business value proposition (automating processes, saving time, providing insight, enabling growth), indicating a need for understanding the business context.

phrases: We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits.
Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on training, certifications, and continuous learning opportunities highlights the importance of adaptability in a growing tech field.

phrases: Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors.
If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues.
soft_skills.justification: The description outlines a multi-stage interview process involving discussions with directors, managers, and colleagues, implying a need for effective communication and collaboration.

phrases: At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'big code leads to greater opportunities' suggests a culture that values impactful contributions and potentially encourages taking ownership of significant projects.
